com.netflix.nicobar.core.execution

Class HystrixScriptModuleExecutor<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nicobar.core.execution.HystrixScriptModuleExecutor<V>

  • public class HystrixScriptModuleExecutor<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    Hystrix based executor for ScriptModuleExecutables. See ScriptModuleExecutionCommand.

        Execute a collection of ScriptModules identified by moduleId.
